TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IParameterInspector

summary.span: 定义自定义参数检查器实现的协定，有了该协定，就可在客户端或服务进行调用之前或紧接着其调用，检查或修改信息。

span.span: Defines the contract implemented by custom parameter inspectors that enables inspection or modification of information prior to and subsequent to calls on either the client or the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，以创建自定义参数检查器，该检查器可在客户端或服务应用程序进行调用之前和之后，查看和修改调用的内容。Implement the interface to create a custom parameter inspector that can view and modify the contents of a call both before the call and after the call in either client or service applications. 对于来自客户端的出站调用，该检查器是在请求内容序列化并发送到服务之前调用的。On outbound calls from a client, the inspector is invoked before the request contents are serialized and sent to the service. 同时，还会在响应消息被反序列化之后，但在将返回值调度到代理方法之前，调用该检查器。The inspector is also called after the response has been deserialized but before the return values have been dispatched to the proxy method. 对于到服务的入站调用，该检查器是在反序列化参数之后、但在这些参数调度到服务操作之前调用的。On inbound calls to a service, the inspector is invoked after parameters are deserialized but before they are dispatched to the service operation. 使用 或 属性，以为特定操作将 实现添加到检查器集合。Use the or the properties to add an implementation to the inspectors collection for a particular operation. **请注意**开发人员和管理员必须确保与其他交互理解实现。**Note** Developers and administrators must ensure that the interaction with other implementations is understood. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 实现：The following code example shows an implementation that: - 在服务反序列化响应或客户端序列化请求之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name and return value to the console after a response has been deserialized by the service or a request has been serialized by a client. - 在客户端反序列化响应或服务序列化响应之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name to the console after deserializing a response on the client or after a response has been serialized on the service. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/interceptors.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/interceptors.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用 , 或 插入 对象。The following code example shows how to use either , or to insert objects. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#5)]

summary.span: 在客户端调用返回之后、服务响应发送之前调用。

span.span: Called after client calls are returned and before service responses are sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于来自客户端的出站调用，该检查器是在请求内容序列化并发送到服务之前调用的。On outbound calls from a client, the inspector is invoked before the request contents are serialized and sent to the service. 同时，还会在响应消息被反序列化之后，但在将返回值调度到代理方法之前，调用该检查器。The inspector is also called after the response has been deserialized but before the return values have been dispatched to the proxy method. 对于到服务的入站调用，该检查器是在反序列化参数之后、但在这些参数调度到服务操作之前调用的。On inbound calls to a service, the inspector is invoked after parameters are deserialized but before they are dispatched to the service operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 实现：The following code example shows an implementation that: - 在服务反序列化响应或客户端序列化请求之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name and return value to the console after a response has been deserialized by the service or a request has been serialized by a client. - 在客户端反序列化响应或服务序列化响应之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name to the console after deserializing a response on the client or after a response has been serialized on the service. param.span: 客户端传递到方法的对象。

summary.span: 在发送客户端调用之前、服务响应返回之后调用。

span.span: Called before client calls are sent and after service responses are returned.

returns.span: 中，作为 参数返回的关联状态。

span.span: The correlation state that is returned as the parameter in .

returns.span: 如果您不打算使用关联状态，则返回 。

span.span: Return if you do not intend to use correlation state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于来自客户端的出站调用，该检查器是在请求内容序列化并发送到服务之前调用的。On outbound calls from a client, the inspector is invoked before the request contents are serialized and sent to the service. 同时，还会在响应消息被反序列化之后，但在将返回值调度到代理方法之前，调用该检查器。The inspector is also called after the response has been deserialized but before the return values have been dispatched to the proxy method. 对于到服务的入站调用，该检查器是在请求内容反序列化并调度到服务操作之后、响应内容反序列化并发送到客户端之前调用的。On inbound calls to a service, the inspector is invoked after the request contents are deserialized and dispatched to the service operation and before the response contents are serialized and sent to the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 实现：The following code example shows an implementation that: - 在服务反序列化响应或客户端序列化请求之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name and return value to the console after a response has been deserialized by the service or a request has been serialized by a client. - 在客户端反序列化响应或服务序列化响应之后，将操作名称和返回值写入控制台。Writes the operation name to the console after deserializing a response on the client or after a response is serialized on the service.
